Love Island star Lucie Donlan posted saucy footage on her Instagram grid on Sunday.

The Newquay native, 21, slipped her killer curves into a white bikini printed with a bright floral design for the short video that showed her stood in the ocean.

Oozing sex appeal, the bombshell playfully tugged at her tiny two-piece as the ocean lapped around her knees.

Lucie's long blonde locks were soaked with surf as she starred down the camera lens in the moving captures.

The surfer captioned the offering: "Listen to the waves... #moments #beachbabe #beachbev #surfergirl #ocean #tropics."

Proving her followers found the clip irresistible they flocked to the comments section to leave messages of admiration.

"Lucie you are looking so stunning," penned a fan.

Others added: "Total babe" and "omg so stunning."

Lucie's sexy post comes as her feud with Love Island co-star Molly-Mae Hague esculated.

(Image: S Meddle/ITV/REX)

According to The Sun, Lucie chose not to invite Molly-Mae to the launch of her £200,000 Peng Hair collaboration in August, days after claiming that “no-one really speaks to her [Molly-Mae]”.

Lucie’s event was attended by a number of Love Islanders including Belle Hassan, Anton Danyluk, Francesca Allen and Marvin Brooks.

(Image: PA)

(Image: mollymaehague /Instagram)

In a show of mutual dislike, Molly-Mae snubbed Lucie by not inviting her to her PrettyLittleThing launch in Manchester less than two weeks later.

Speaking to The Sun, a source said: “While Lucie and Tommy were close in the villa, viewers saw that Molly-Mae didn’t appreciate her declarations of love while they were together.

“There hasn’t been a single explosive incident that forced Lucie and Molly-Mae apart, it just became clear upon leaving the villa that there was no friendship there.”
